item.title: Is the European Union a cause worth sacrificing for? Contemplating the future of Ukraine and the EU.
item.description:
There were many reasons to criticize the Yanukovych government in Ukraine, but the protests that led to its downfall were sparked by Yanukovych’s refusal to sign an agreement with the European Union. This strong desire for EU membership among some Ukrainians raises important questions about the EU’s future. The first steps after the planned elections would be straightforward. A pro-European government would likely ratify the association agreement, which connects Ukraine to EU law more closely than previous agreements...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/is-the-european-union-a-cause-worth-sacrificing-for-contemplating-the-future-of-ukraine-and-the-eu/
